column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I really enjoyed that everything is customizable. I wouldn't say I'm necessarily a picky eater but I hate when there's more than one ingredient I don't want because then I feel like I'm being an ass/picky by asking the waiter to 86 those items. But you can pretty much mix and match which I loved. I went with the classic chicken and got some chicken dumplings on the side. Holy hell those dumplings were incredible
column2: truly. And the ramen portion was the perfect size and very tasty. I highly recommend getting a couple dumplings to dip in your ramen! I'll be back!
